Snap_Shot.display_help: A quick attack that fires an arrow at your foe after only minimal aiming. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

Aimed_Shot.display_help: Though it takes longer to execute, your Aimed Shot deals greater damage than Snap Shot. Damage: High, Recharge: Fast

Fistful_of_Arrows.display_help: You fire a fistful of arrows at foes in a cone in front of you. Good at close range. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Stunning_Shot.display_help: You fire a blunt, weighted arrow at your target's chest. The Stunning Shot inflicts high damage and has a good chance of stunning your foe. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Aim.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage and range. Recharge: Long

Explosive_Arrow.display_help: You fire a grenade-tipped arrow at long range. This explosion affects all within the blast radius, and can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Blazing_Arrow.display_help: You fire a Blazing Arrow at your foe, dealing some Lethal damage and causing them to catch on fire and burn. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Ranged_Shot.display_help: A perfectly aimed and fast shot that blasts your foes. Damage: Very High, Recharge: Slow

Rain_of_Arrows.display_help: You unleash a Rain of Arrows on a targeted location, damaging foes within a large area. Damage: Extreme (DoT), Recharge: Long

Burst.display_help: Quickly fires a Burst of rounds at a single target at very long range. Damage is average, but the fire rate is fast. Can also reduce the target's defense. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Burst.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Assault Rifle.

Beanbag.display_help: Fires a single non lethal rubber bullet that can seriously Disorient a target. Deals little damage and takes a long time to reload, but renders most targets unable to attack for a good while. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

Buckshot.display_help: Good at close range. Fires a cone of Buckshot pellets and can knock some foes down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Slug.display_help: Fires a single Slug at a targeted foe. Firing a single Slug is slower than firing a Burst, but deals more damage, is longer range, and can knock down foes. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Aim.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage and range. Recharge: Long
Aim.display_attacker_hit: You activate {PowerName} and increase the power of your next few attacks.

M30_Grenade.display_help: Launches a Grenade at long range from beneath the barrel of your Assault Rifle. This explosion affects all within the blast radius, and can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Flamethrower.display_help: Spews forth a cone of flames from underneath the barrel of your assault rifle, setting foes on fire. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Extreme(DoT) Recharge: Slow
Flamethrower.display_target_help: The Flamethrower has set you on fire and you are burning.

Incinerator.display_help: Sprays a target with accelerant from your flamethrower, igniting it and causing extreme damage over time. Damage: Extreme(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Incinerator.display_target_help: You have been ignited! You are burning.

Full_Auto.display_help: Opens up your assault rifle on Full Auto to lay down a massive spray of bullets at your target. Although very slow to reload, damage from this attack is massive, shredding all targets within the narrow cone of effect. There's a chance you may land a lucky shot for extra damage. Damage: Superior(DoT), Recharge: Slow

Single_Shot.display_help: You fire a single blast from your Beam Rifle which deals Moderate Energy damage and has a chance to knock the target down. If the target is suffering from the Disintegrating effect, Single Shot will reduce the target's regeneration rate slightly. In addition, targets already affected by the Disintegrating effect have a chance to spread to 3 nearby targets. This Disintegrate Spread effect can only hit targets that aren't already affected by the Disintegrating effect. Disintegrate Spread causes Minor Energy damage over time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Single_Shot.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Energy), Foe Knockdown, Special

Charged_Shot.display_help: By charging up your Beam Rifle, you're able to launch a concentrated blast of energy at your foe to cause High Energy damage. The impact strikes with such force that it can knock your target off of their feet. Charge Shot causes additional damage if the target is suffering from the Disintegrating effect. In addition, targets already affected by the Disintegrating effect have a chance to spread to 3 nearby targets. This Disintegrate Spread effect can only hit targets that aren't already affected by the Disintegrating effect. Disintegrate Spread causes Minor Energy damage over time. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Charged_Shot.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Energy), Foe Knockdown, Special

Cutting_Beam.display_help: You fire a constant stream of energy from your weapon and sweep it in a broad arc blasting all foes in a wide cone in front of you. Cutting beam deals Moderate Energy damage and reduces the targets' Defense. This power will cause Minor Energy damage over time if the target is suffering from the Disintegrating effect. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Long
Cutting_Beam.display_target_help: Your defense has been reduced by the Cutting Beam!

Disintegrate.display_help: You fire a stream of energy at your foe which causes them to slowly disintegrate and suffer High Energy damage over time. Even after the damage over time effect wears off the target will have their regeneration rate reduced and suffer from the Disintegration effect for an additional period of time. Using Beam Rifle powers on targets affected by Disintegrate will inflict additional effects. Additionally if Single Shot, Charged Shot, Lancer Shot and Penetrating Ray are used on a target suffering from Disintegrating, they have a chance to cause this effect to spread to up 3 nearby targets that aren't already suffering from Disintegrating. Targets affected by this Disintegrate Spread will also suffer some Minor Energy damage over time. Damage: High, Recharge: Long
Disintegrate.display_target_help: You are suffering from energy damage over time, have your regenerate rate reduced and are suffering from the Disintegration effect.

Aim.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage and range. Recharge: Long
Aim.display_attacker_hit: You activate {PowerName} and increase the power of your next few attacks.

Lancer_Shot.display_help: You charge up your Beam Rifle and deliver an incredibly focused ray of energy at a nearby foe that deals Superior Energy damage and will briefly stun the target. Lancer Shot will cause additional damage if the target is suffering from the Disintegrating effect. In addition, targets already affected by the Disintegrating effect have a chance to spread to 3 nearby targets. This Disintegrate Spread effect can only hit targets that aren't already affected by the Disintegration effect. Disintegrate Spread causes Minor Energy damage over time. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Lancer_Shot.display_target_help: You have disoriented by the Lancer Shot's impact.

Refractor_Beam.display_help: You carefully calibrate your rifle and shoot a refractor beam that will split up on impact, dealing moderate energy damage and reducing the defense of your target and 9 nearby foes. The beam has a high chance to split again off the secondary targets, hitting up to 10 foes. If the target is also suffering from the Disintegrating effect it will suffer additional damage over time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Slow

Piercing_Beam.display_help: You release a supercharged beam in a narrow cone of energy that pierces through up to 3 enemies. Piercing Beam deals High Energy damage and briefly reduces their damage resistance. If a target struck by Piercing Beam is suffering from the Disintegrating effect it will immediately suffer additional damage. Damage: High, Recharge: Long
Piercing_Beam.display_short_help: Narrow Ranged (Cone), High DMG(Energy), Foes -Res, Special
Piercing_Beam.display_target_help: Your damage resistance has been reduced by the Piercing Beam.

Overcharge.display_help: You overcharge your Beam Rifle and release a massive blast of energy at a group of distant foes causing Extreme Energy damage, causing Minor Energy damage over time, reducing the defense of all affected foes and potentially stunning affected foes. If Overcharge strikes a target suffering from the Disintegrating effect they will be affected by a longer stun. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Overcharge.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Extreme DMG(Energy), Foe Minor DoT (Energy), -Def(All), Disorient, Special
Overcharge.display_target_help: You have been disoriented and are suffering energy damage over time from the Overcharge.

Dark_Blast.display_help: A long range blast of dark energy. Deals moderate Negative Energy damage and reduces the target's chance to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Dark_Blast.display_target_help: The Dark Blast has reduced your chance to hit.

Gloom.display_help: Gloom slowly drains a target of life, while reducing their chance to hit. Slower than Dark Blast, but deals more damage over time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Gloom.display_target_help: The Gloom is causing damage to you and reducing your chance to hit.

Umbral_Torrent.display_help: You summon a wave of mire that sweeps away foes within its arc. This attack deals moderate Negative Energy damage to foes, reduces their chance to hit and sends them flying. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
Umbral_Torrent.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Moderate DMG(Smashing), Foe -To Hit, Knockback
Umbral_Torrent.display_target_help: The Torrent has reduced your chance to hit.

Abyssal_Gaze.display_help: You gaze into your foe's eyes giving them a glimpse into the terrifying netherworld rendering them held, reducing their chance to hit and dealing High Negative Energy damage over the next couple of seconds. Damage: High Recharge: Slow
Abyssal_Gaze.display_short_help: Ranged, High DoT(Negative), Foe Hold, -To Hit
Abyssal_Gaze.display_target_help: The Petrifying Gaze has stopped you in your tracks!

Aim.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage and range. Recharge: Long
Aim.display_attacker_hit: You activate {PowerName} and increase the power of your next few attacks.

Dark_Obliteration.display_help: You hurl a large blast of negative energy that violently explodes on impact, exposing the dark power of the Netherworld to all foes near the target. Dark Obliteration can reduce the Accuracy of all affected targets. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Antumbral_Beam.display_help: An extremely focused beam of Negative Energy that deals tremendous damage and reduces the target's chance to hit. Damage: Very High, Recharge: Slow
Antumbral_Beam.display_target_help: The Moonbeam has reduced your chance to hit.

Life_Drain.display_help: You can tap the power of the Netherworld to steal some life from a target foe and reduce their chance to hit. Some of that stolen life is transferred to you in the form of Hit Points. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Life_Drain.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Negative), Target -To Hit, Self +HP
Life_Drain.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced by the Life Drain.

Blackstar.display_help: You can unleash a devastating blast of Negative Energy around yourself, dealing massive Negative Energy and Smashing damage and severely reducing affected foes' chance to hit. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Blackstar.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced by the Blackstar.

Pistols.display_help: Quickly fires a round from one of your heavy automatic pistols. Damage is average, but the fire rate is very fast. If standard ammo is used, Pistols will also reduce the target's Defense. NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from -Defense to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Dual_Wield.display_help: Dual Wield fires both pistols in rapid succession at its desired target. This power is slower than Pistols, but deals more damage, and the target may get knocked back by the force of the impact. NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from Knockback to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Dual_Wield.display_target_help: The secondary effect placed on you by a Dual Pistols attack varies depending on the type of ammo used. If you were struck with Cryo Rounds, you will suffer from a minor slow effect. If you were struck with Incendiary Rounds you will suffer some damage over time. If you were struck with Chemical Rounds you will have your damage output slightly decreased.

Empty_Clips.display_help: You empty the clips of both your pistols in an arc of suppression fire. This attack can blast multiple foes in the affected cone area, and has a small chance of knocking some foes down. Affected targets will have their defense reduced slightly as well if Standard Ammo is equipped. NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from Knockdown to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Empty_Clips.display_target_help: The secondary effect placed on you by a Dual Pistols attack varies depending on the type of ammo used. If you were struck with Cryo Rounds, you will suffer from a minor slow effect. If you were struck with Incendiary Rounds you will suffer some damage over time. If you were struck with Chemical Rounds you will have your damage output slightly decreased.

Suppressive_Fire.display_help: Suppressive Fire allows the user to quickly stun their target for a short time and deal an extreme amount of Lethal damage. NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from Disorient effect to a Hold effect if 'Cryo Ammo', 'Incendiary Ammo' or 'Chemical Ammo' are loaded. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Moderate
Suppressive_Fire.display_target_help: The secondary effect placed on you by a Dual Pistols attack varies depending on the type of ammo used. If you were struck with Standard Rounds, you will suffer from a Disorient effect. If you were struck with 'Cryo Rounds', 'Incendiary Rounds', or 'Chemical Rounds' you will suffer from a hold effect.

Swap_Ammo.display_help: By purchasing this power, you will be granted the Cryo Ammunition, Incendiary Ammunition and Chemical Ammunition toggles. Activating these toggles will change your secondary damage type on most Dual Pistols attacks from lethal (Standard Rounds) to cold (Cryo Rounds), fire (Incendiary Rounds) or toxic (Chemical Rounds). These toggles are mutually exclusive and only one can be active at a time. If no Swap Ammo toggles are active, the player will revert to Standard Ammunition. Different ammo types also have different secondary effects. Examine your Dual Pistols powers for more information.

Cryo_Ammunition.display_help: While this toggle is active you will be equipped with 'Cryo Rounds'. Most of your Dual Pistol attacks will have their secondary damage converted to cold damage and inflict a minor slow effect on the target. Cryo Rounds are more aerodynamic, being able to travel a greater distance. In order to earn this power, you must purchase the Swap Ammo power. Recharge: Fast

Incendiary_Ammunition.display_help: While this toggle is active you will be equipped with 'Incendiary Rounds.' Most of your Dual Pistol attacks will have their secondary damage converted to fire damage and inflict a minor damage over time effect. In order to earn this power, you must purchase the Swap Ammo power. Recharge: Fast

Chemical_Ammunition.display_help: While this toggle is active you will be equipped with 'Chemical Rounds.' Most of your Dual Pistol attacks will have their secondary damage converted to toxic damage and inflict a minor damage debuff effect on the target. In order to earn this power, you must purchase the Swap Ammo power. Recharge: Fast

Bullet_Rain.display_help: You fire your pistols faster than the human eye can follow, causing your bullet trajectory to arc, dealing moderate Lethal damage and possibly knocking your foes back. NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from Knockback to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Bullet_Rain.display_target_help: The secondary effect placed on you by a Dual Pistols attack varies depending on the type of ammo used. If you were struck with Cryo Rounds, you will suffer from a minor slow effect. If you were struck with Incendiary Rounds you will suffer some damage over time. If you were struck with Chemical Rounds you will have your damage output slightly decreased.

Executioners_Shot.display_help: Executioner's Shot is a deadly ranged attack. Foes struck by this attack will suffer lethal damage and will likely be knocked back by the impact of this attack. Targets struck by Executioner's Shot while no special ammunition is equipped will have their defenses reduced for a short time. NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from Knockback to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Executioners_Shot.display_target_help: The secondary effect placed on you by a Dual Pistols attack varies depending on the type of ammo used. If you were struck with Cryo Rounds, you will suffer from a minor slow effect. If you were struck with Incendiary Rounds you will suffer some damage over time. If you were struck with Chemical Rounds you will have your damage output slightly decreased.

Piercing_Rounds.display_help: You fire your pistols with deadly precision in a very narrow cone, piercing up to three enemies. Piercing Rounds deals Superior lethal damage and reduces targets' Damage Resistance for a short time. NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from a resistance debuff to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded. Damage: High. Recharge: Slow
Piercing_Rounds.display_target_help: The secondary effect placed on you by a Dual Pistols attack varies depending on the type of ammo used. If you were struck by 'Standard Rounds' you will have your resistance reduced, 'Cryo Rounds' will inflict a minor slow effect, 'Incendiary Rounds' will cause some damage over time and 'Chemical Rounds' will slightly reduce your damage output.

Hail_of_Bullets.display_help: You fire a hail of bullets at all enemies around you dealing Extreme lethal damage. Enemies that are struck have a chance to be knocked down. Having Standard Rounds will dramatically increase this chance to knockdown your foes. If you hit at least one target you will gain a moderate melee, ranged and AoE Defense bonus for a brief period. NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from a guaranteed knockdown effect to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long
Hail_of_Bullets.display_short_help: PBAoE, Superior DMG(Lethal/Special), Self +Def(Melee, Ranged, AoE), Foe Knockdown/Special
Hail_of_Bullets.display_target_help: The secondary effect placed on you by a Dual Pistols attack varies depending on the type of ammo used. If you were struck with Cryo Rounds, you will suffer from a minor slow effect. If you were struck with Incendiary Rounds you will suffer some damage over time. If you were struck with Chemical Rounds you will have your damage output slightly decreased.

Charged_Bolts.display_help: You can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes, dealing some damage and draining some Endurance. Some of this Endurance may transfer back to you. Charged Bolts deals light damage but recharges quickly. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Lightning_Bolt.display_help: You can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe, dealing heavy damage and draining some Endurance. Some of this Endurance may transfer back to you. Lightning Bolt deals more damage than Charged Bolts, but recharges more slowly. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Ball_Lightning.display_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area of effect, and drains some Endurance from each target it hits. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Ball_Lightning.display_target_help: The Ball Lightning is continuing to electrocute you.

Zapping_Bolt.display_help: A focused electrical blast that can be fired off at a quick speed with high Accuracy. Zapping Bolt drains Endurance. Damage: Very High, Recharge: Slow

Aim.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage and range. Recharge: Long

Tesla_Cage.display_help: Tesla Cage inflicts extreme damage and confines the target in an electrical prison. The target is overwhelmed by the electrical charge and is left helpless and can be attacked. The target is drained of some Endurance and some of that Endurance may be transferred back to you. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Moderate
Tesla_Cage.display_target_help: The Tesla Cage is holding you helpless.

Voltaic_Sentinel.display_help: You can manifest a polarized electricity field that hovers above the ground and hurls bolts of electricity at nearby foes. Any enemy that passes near this Sentinel risks serious injury. The Sentinel is not alive and cannot be targeted or attacked by enemies. The Sentinel can fly and will follow you. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long
Voltaic_Sentinel.display_short_help: Summon Sentinel: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Energy), Foe -End

Short_Circuit.display_help: Releases a burst of electrical energy around you, shocking all nearby foes. This highly accurate discharge deals Moderate damage over time, drains a lot of Endurance from the targets and renders them unable to recover Endurance for quite a while. Additionally, Short Circuit deals extra damage to most robots and mechanical foes. Short Circuit is very effective when used with your other Endurance draining powers. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Short_Circuit.display_target_help: The Short Circuit is continuing to electrocute you. Your Endurance recovery is greatly reduced.

Thunderous_Blast.display_help: You hurl a tremendously powerful bolt of lightning at a target, devastating all nearby foes. Thunderous Blast deals extreme Energy and Smashing damage and drains a lot of Endurance from nearby foes. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Thunderous_Blast.display_target_help: Your Endurance Recovery is greatly reduced by the Thunderous Blast.

Power_Bolt.display_help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Power_Blast.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Energy_Torrent.display_help: Energy Torrent unleashes a cone of powerful energy that can smash foes and possibly send them flying. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Power_Burst.display_help: A devastating attack, Power Burst unleashes a massive amount of energy dealing very high damage at short distances. The impact from this burst often knocks back most foes. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow

Aim.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage and range. Recharge: Long

Power_Push.display_help: This ranged attack deals little damage, but sends the target flying for a great distance. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
Power_Push.display_short_help: Ranged Minor DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe High Knockback

Explosive_Blast.display_help: You hurl a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target. Explosive Blast may knock targets backwards. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Explosive_Blast.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Smash/Energy), Foe Knockback

Focused_Power_Bolt.display_help: A focused and very accurate blast that deals tremendous damage. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

Nova.display_help: You can explode in a tremendous blast of energy, sending nearby foes flying. The Nova deals extreme Energy and Smashing damage to all nearby foes. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long

Flares.display_help: A quick attack that throws Flares at the target. Little damage, but very fast. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast
Flares.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Fire_Blast.display_help: Sends a Blast of Fire at a targeted foe and sets the target on fire for a short period of time. Slower recharge rate than Flares, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Fire_Blast.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Fire_Ball.display_help: Hurls an exploding Fireball that consumes a targeted foe, and all nearby enemies. Anyone in that explosion is burned and set ablaze. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Fire_Ball.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Blaze.display_help: A devastating flame attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Blaze.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Aim.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage and range. Recharge: Long

Fire_Breath.display_help: You can breathe forth a torrent of fire that burns all foes within its narrow cone. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Fire_Breath.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Blazing_Blast.display_help: An extremely quick long range beam of fire that blasts your foes. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Blazing_Blast.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Rain_of_Fire.display_help: Summons a Rain of Fire over a targeted location, burning foes and reducing their movement speed within a large area. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Long
Rain_of_Fire.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Inferno.display_help: Unleashes a massive fiery explosion to devastate all nearby enemies and set them ablaze. Inferno deals Extreme Fire damage to all nearby foes and inflicts Moderate Fire damage over time. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Inferno.display_short_help: PBAoE, Extreme DMG(Fire/Smash), Foe Moderate DoT(Fire)
Inferno.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Ice_Bolt.display_help: Ice Bolt quickly pelts an enemy with small icy daggers; their chill Slows a foe's attacks and movement for a time. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Ice_Bolt.display_target_help: Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Ice Bolt.

Ice_Blast.display_help: Ice Blast hurls shards of ice at foes and Slows their attacks and movement for a time. Slower recharge than Ice Bolt, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Blast.display_target_help: Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Ice Blast.

Frost_Breath.display_help: Unleashes a cone of frosty breath that can Slow your opponents' movement and attacks. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Frost_Breath.display_target_help: You are freezing. Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Frost Breath.

Chilling_Ray.display_help: Chilling Ray encases your foe in a frail block of ice, holding them helpless in place for a while. The block of ice will break if attacked. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Chilling_Ray.display_target_help: You are frozen solid by the Chilling Ray.

Aim.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage and range. Recharge: Long

Ice_Storm.display_help: Shred your foes with this Ice Storm. This power deals a lot of damage in a large area and can Slow all affected targets movement and attack speed. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Long
Ice_Storm.display_short_help: Ranged (Location AoE), Minor DoT(Cold, Lethal), Foe -Recharge, -SPD
Ice_Storm.display_target_help: You are freezing. Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Freezing Rain.

Bitter_Ice_Blast.display_help: A slower yet more powerful version of Ice Blast, Bitter Ice Blast deals much more damage and can also reduce your enemy's chance to hit. Like other Ice Blast powers, Bitter Ice Blast can Slow a target's movement and attack speed. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Bitter_Ice_Blast.display_target_help: Your chance to hit, Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Bitter Ice Blast.

Bitter_Freeze_Ray.display_help: This power can Hold your opponent frozen solid in a block of ice. The victim can be attacked and will remain frozen and helpless. After the ice thaws, the victim emerges chilled and Slowed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Bitter_Freeze_Ray.display_target_help: You are frozen solid by the Bitter Freeze Ray.

Blizzard.display_help: You can conjure a Blizzard that inflicts Extreme Cold and Lethal damage over time and can Slow the attack rate of all your opponents in a large area, reducing their chance to hit and possibly knocking them back. Damage: Extreme(DoT), Recharge: Very Long
Blizzard.display_short_help: Ranged (Location AoE), Extreme DoT(Cold), Foe -To Hit, -SPD, -Recharge, Knockback
Blizzard.display_target_help: You are caught in a freezing Blizzard. You are freezing and your Attack rate, chance to hit and Movement speed are reduced.

Mental_Blast.display_help: This basic attack does moderate Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Mental_Blast.display_target_help: The Mental Blast has slowed your Attack rate.

Telekinetic_Blast.display_help: You can use Telekinesis to Blast a targeted foe with the power of your mind. This attack deals Smashing and Psionic damage, and can knock your opponent back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Psychic_Scream.display_help: This howl of Psionic energy resonates in the minds of all foes within its conical area of effect, inflicting moderate damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Psychic_Scream.display_target_help: The Psychic Scream has reduced your Attack rate.

Will_Domination.display_help: This powerful attack deals Psionic damage, and is so painful it usually renders its target unconscious. The victim is asleep, and will wake if disturbed. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Aim.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage and range. Recharge: Long

Psionic_Strike.display_help: This extremely accurate attack does moderate Psionic damage and can Slow a target's attack rate. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Psionic_Strike.display_target_help: The Psionic Lance has reduced your Attack rate.

Psionic_Tornado.display_help: Unleashes a whirlwind of Psionic energy on a target, tossing nearby foes into the air. The Psionic Tornado damages foes and Slows their attack speed. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Psionic_Tornado.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DoT(Psionic), Foe Knockback
Psionic_Tornado.display_target_help: You are taking psionic damage over time.

Scramble_Thoughts.display_help: Painfully scrambles the synapses of a targeted foe, leaving them dramatically Disoriented for a short duration. Deals a little Psionic Damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

Psychic_Wail.display_help: Psychic Wail is a devastating Psionic attack that wracks the minds of all nearby foes which deals Extreme Psionic damage. Those that survive will have a severely reduced attack rate and may be left Disoriented. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long
Psychic_Wail.display_target_help: The Psychic Wail has reduced your attack rate.

Neutrino_Bolt.display_help: A very quick, but low damage attack. Neutrino Bolt can reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast
Neutrino_Bolt.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Neutrino Bolt.

X-Ray_Beam.display_help: You can emit a beam of X-Ray energy from your eyes, dealing moderate Energy damage. This attack can bypass some defenses and can reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
X-Ray_Beam.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the X-Ray Beam.

Irradiate.display_help: You can emit lethal amounts of radiation in all directions, damaging all nearby foes for a short time. Like other Radiation attacks, this power can bypass some of a target's defenses. Irradiate severely reduces the target's Defense. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Irradiate.display_target_help: You are irradiated and taking damage over time. Your Defense has been reduced.

Cosmic_Burst.display_help: Cosmic Burst smashes the target with cosmic particles. The attack is devastating and can leave most targets Disoriented and with reduced Defense. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Cosmic_Burst.display_target_help: You are disoriented and your Defenses are reduced.

Aim.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage and range. Recharge: Long
Aim.display_attacker_hit: You activate {PowerName} and increase the power of your next few attacks.

Electron_Haze.display_help: A short range conical blast of free electrons. This attack can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. It can also knock some targets down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Electron_Haze.display_short_help: Close, Moderate Cone DMG(Energy), Foe -DEF, Knockback
Electron_Haze.display_target_help: The Electron Haze has reduced your Defenses.

Proton_Stream.display_help: Hurls a volley of alpha particles at your target. Proton Volley is highly accurate and will reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Proton_Stream.display_target_help: The Proton Volley has reduced your Defenses.

Neutron_Bomb.display_help: This devastating attack lobs an explosive sphere of deadly radiation, damaging the target and all nearby foes. Neutron Bomb can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Neutron_Bomb.display_target_help: The Neutron Bomb has reduced your Defenses.

Atomic_Blast.display_help: This attack taps most of your stored energy to deal a devastating Atomic Blast which deals Extreme Energy and Smashing damage. Any foes left standing will have their Defense greatly reduced and may be left helplessly choking on toxic vapors. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Atomic_Blast.display_target_help: The Atomic Blast has left you held and your defenses are reduced.

Shriek.display_help: You let forth a quick Shriek, damaging your target and weakening his Damage Resistance. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Shriek.display_target_help: The sonic Shriek has weakened you. You are more vulnerable to damage.

Scream.display_help: Your Scream can cause serious damage to a target, while weakening his resistance to further damage. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Scream.display_target_help: You are being buffeted by waves of sound and taking damage! Your Damage Resistance has been reduced.

Howl.display_help: A short range, but powerful sonic attack that can hit multiple enemies in an arc in front of you. Damage: Medium, Recharge: Slow
Howl.display_target_help: The Howl has reduced your Damage Resistance.

Shout.display_help: You blast your foe with a tremendous Shout, damaging them and reducing their Damage Resistance. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Shout.display_target_help: The sonic Shout has reduced your Damage Resistance.

Amplify.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage and range. Recharge: Long

Shockwave.display_help: You can call forth a tremendous Shockwave that can knock down foes and deal some Smashing damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

Sirens_Song.display_help: You send forth a subsonic pulse which causes your foes to fall unconscious and take some minor damage. Your foes will remain unconscious for a good while, but will waken if disturbed. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Long
Sirens_Song.display_target_help: The Siren's Song has rendered you unconscious.

Screech.display_help: By bursting forth with this hypersonic Screech, you can disorient a target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
Screech.display_target_help: You have been Disoriented and your resistance to damage has been decreased.

Dreadful_Wail.display_help: Your Dreadful Wail is so strong that most foes will be defeated by being subjected to it. Dreadful Wail deals Extreme Smashing and Energy damage to all nearby foes in addition to reducing their defense and disorienting them for a good while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Dreadful_Wail.display_target_help: You have been Disoriented and your resistance to damage has been decreased.

Aqua_Bolt.display_help: You strike your foe with a rapid blast of freezing cold water causing Light Cold and Smashing damage as well as reducing their defense. Aqua Bolt builds 1 Tidal Power. Damage: Light, Recharge: Very Fast
Aqua_Bolt.display_short_help: Ranged, Light DMG(Cold/Smash), Foe -Def, Self +Tidal Power
Aqua_Bolt.display_target_help: Your defense is reduced by the Aqua Bolt.

Hydro_Blast.display_help: You briefly focus before releasing an intense blast of chilling water at your foe that causes High Cold and Smashing damage. Affected foes will have their movement speed reduced briefly and have a chance to be knocked down. Hydro Blast builds 1 Tidal Power. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Hydro_Blast.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Cold/Smash), Foe -Speed, Knockdown, Self +Tidal Power
Hydro_Blast.display_target_help: Your movement speed has been reduced by the Hydro Blast!

Water_Burst.display_help: You cause water to violently explode from beneath your target's feet blasting all foes nearby with freezing cold water. Affected targets will suffer Moderate Cold and Smashing damage, have their movement speed reduced and may be knocked down by the force of the blast. Water Burst consumes all Tidal Power. It will deal additional cold damage and have a greater chance to knockdown for each stack of Tidal Power. If you have 3 stacks of Tidal Power Water Burst will have a 100% chance to knock the targets into the air. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Water_Burst.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Cold/Smash), Foe -Speed, Knockdown, Self -Tidal Power
Water_Burst.display_target_help: Your movement speed has been reduced by the Water Burst!

Dehydrate.display_help: You rapidly dehydrate your target, causing Moderate Cold and Smashing damage, reducing their movement speed and defense as well as causing a measure of Cold damage over time. You are then healed over time for a moderate amount of health. Dehydrate grants 1 stack of Tidal Power if you have 2 or less. Dehydrate will consume all stacks of Tidal Power if you have 3, but the power's heal over time effect is increased by 50%. NOTE: This power will grant a regeneration buff in PvP zones instead of a heal over time. Damage: Moderate, Light DoT, Recharge: Moderate
Dehydrate.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Cold/Smash), Foe -Speed, -Defense, Light DoT(Cold), Self +Heal Over Time, +/- Tidal Power
Dehydrate.display_target_help: Your movement speed and defense has been reduced by the Dehydrate!

Tidal_Forces.display_help: You draw tidal energies into yourself thus boosting your chance to hit significantly, slightly boosting your damage, range and granting yourself +3 Tidal Power. Recharge: Very Long

Whirlpool.display_help: You create a violent whirlpool at the target location causing Cold damage over time, reducing the targets' speed and defense for a short time. Whirlpool grants 1 stack of Tidal Power. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Long
Whirlpool.display_short_help: Ranged (Location AoE), High DoT(Cold), -Speed, -Defense, Self +Tidal Power
Whirlpool.display_target_help: The whirlpool reduces the defense and movement speed of its victims.

Water_Jet.display_help: You spray a concentrated torrent of water toward your target that causes High Cold and Smashing damage as well as reducing your target's movement speed. If you have 2 or less Tidal Power, you will gain a stack of Tidal Power. If you have 3 Tidal Power and you activate this power, it will have an enhanced effect causing Water Jet to cast slightly faster and immediately reset the recharge of Water Jet. Water Jet's enhanced effect can be used once every 8 seconds. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Water_Jet.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Cold/Smash), Foe -Speed, Self +/-Tidal Power
Water_Jet.display_target_help: Your speed is reduced by the Water Jet.

Steam_Spray.display_help: You spray scalding hot steam in a cone in front of you badly burning affected targets. Steam Spray causes Moderate Fire damage, Minor Fire damage over time and reduces the target's Defense slightly. Steam Spray grants 1 stack of Tidal Power. Damage: High, Recharge: Long
Steam_Spray.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), High DMG(Fire), Foe -Defense, Minor DoT(Fire), Self +Tidal Power
Steam_Spray.display_target_help: You are burning from the Steam Spray and your defense is reduced!

Geyser.display_help: You cause the earth to erupt beneath your target's feet as a Geyser of scalding hot water burns your foes and tosses them violently into the air. Geyser causes High Fire and Smashing damage before causing High Fire damage over time as well as reducing their movement speed. Geyser consumes all Tidal Power. Both the initial damage and damage over time portions of this power will be increased and have a scaling chance to disorient for each stack of Tidal Power. If you have 3 stacks of Tidal Power, Geyser will have a 100% chance to disorient affected targets. Damage: High & High DoT, Recharge: Very Slow
Geyser.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), High DMG(Fire/Smash), Foe High DoT(Fire), -Speed, Knock Up, Disorient, Self -Tidal Power
Geyser.display_target_help: Your movement speed has been reduced by the Geyser
